DOC.detailed_description: The active botanical constituent femMED Breast Health Formula contain lignans , compound anti-estrogenic activity , show exert estrogenic effect follicular phase [ i.e . estrogen low ] antiestrogenic effect luteal phase female menstrual cycle . These plant-derived chemical act weak mimic estrogen body . Overall compound find helpful stabilize natural cyclical fluctuation estrogen level . The trial double-blind , placebo-controlled parallel study 100 subject recruit one two arm study : one arm consist pre-menopausal woman ; another consist post-menopausal woman . Each arm study carry concurrently one phase , washout period . The placebo assignment randomize within arm study . Subjects arm study follow protocol . Urine blood sample collect group first last visit , subject receive month 's supply treatment placebo first visit , consume daily basis second lab visit 28 day later . Urine sample analyze follow estrogen metabolite : 2-OH-estrone 16-Î± OH-estrone . Blood sample would collect assessed level enterolactone . Pre post-supplementation result assess difference statistical comparison .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Healthy Willing collect urine sample blood drawn Postmenopausal take hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) past year ( 48 subject ) Premenopausal ( 48 subject ) Diagnosed major illness ( e.g . cancer ) Diabetes , thyroid disease , atypical hyperplasia , fibrocystic breast disease , family history ovarian cancer , history `` migraine aura '' Women take blood thinner thyroid medication ( include warfarin ) Known allergy study ingredient Pregnancy lactation Regular consumption previous 3 month natural health product ( NHPs ) pharmaceutical contain ingredient similar effect estrogen metabolism include femMED Breast Health treatment Family history breast cancer risk Postmenopausal woman HRT Premenopausal woman take hormonal contraceptive ( oral contraceptive , patch etc . ) All form estrogen , progesterone and/or androgen ( i.e . testosterone therapy )
